segments.text: Good morning , Sir . Are you here to get some advice about our new Personal Financing Program ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am indeed . What can you tell me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The account is a compound savings account , which is in RIB and Forex .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you can have a Money Link card . You can also base the account on time deposits . The choice is yours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about the interest ? I'm not really happy with the interest I'm receiving through my Current Account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The interest on this new account is higher than any of the accounts in our Personal Financing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds better . Also , can I use the one card for several accounts ? Say , if I have two or three accounts and want to transfer money from one to the other ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you can have multi-accounts on the card , you can also make transfers from the account and securities companies and various other benefits .
segments.speaker: S1
